item.description:
What an Absolutely, Positively, Fantastic Cribbage MeetUp last night was: 19 in attendance and 5 that did not know how to play cribbage at all - BUT, when they left they knew how and ALL OF THEM are going to come back and skunk us! OH I think they beat us already Joe? Good going Isabelle! and I think Rachel won also Emad? Noelle?

We had 9 regular members, 5 new members that knew how to play cribbage, and the 5 new members that didn't ! It was really fun meeting ALL: Fred, Brett, Debbie, Kim, Sarah, Liz, Jeff and Tony, including those that were already mentioned :) Really Really hope Y'ALL come back now Y'hear!

AND our new organizer Tony (we both won a game, but I gave him the yodeling pickle anyway) gave me two brand new cribbage boards that we can raffle off: one this month and one next month :) And I bought another 4 person wooden board from a gift certificate Tony gave me for running this shindig :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage MeetUp - No Leap Day this Month/Lucky Guys!
